entry.def: If you describe a lie as a whopper, you mean that it is very far from the truth.

entry.tran: 特别大的物体;庞然大物
entry.def: If you refer to something as a whopper, you mean that it is an unusually large example of the thing mentioned.

example.ex: As comets go, it is a whopper.
example.tran: 就彗星而言，它可是个庞然大物。

means.word_mean: 1. a gross untruth; a blatant lie
2. something especially big or impressive of its kind

example.en: That one's a whopper. I don't believe a word of it.
example.zh: 那是个弥天大谎。一个字我也不会信。
那东西的确是个庞然大物!
